entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
